featured.text: According to the examples mentioned in the passage, which blood type can we infer is the LEAST favored in Japan? (A) Type A. (B) Type B. (C) Type O. (D) Type AB. 43.
This may help explain why younger children tend to favor the creative fields such as music, art, and writing.
However, for people who are not necessarily religious but are fond of nature, names 35 things of beauty are often favored.
Women’s fashions are changing: One season they may favor pantsuits, but the next season they may prefer miniskirts.

definition.zh_def: 恩惠；幫助或支持的行為
definition.en_def: An act of kindness or support; a preference or advantage given to someone.
definition.example: She did me a favor by helping me with my homework.
